import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialog } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { DailogLoginComponent } from '../dailog-login/dailog-login.component'; import { DailogSignupComponent } from '../dailog-signup/dailog-signup.component'; import { MyserviceService } from '../myservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-biryani-bay', templateUrl: './biryani-bay.component.html', styleUrls: ['./biryani-bay.component.css'], }) export class BiryaniBayComponent { login!: boolean; user: any; userget: any; clicked: boolean = false; dishes: any[] = []; constructor(public dialog: MatDialog, private service: MyserviceService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.service.check(); this.service.datachangeobservable.subscribe((d) => (this.login = d)); this.user = localStorage.getItem('Name'); const user1 = this.user.replaceAll('"', ' '); this.userget = user1; } openDialog() { this.dialog.open(DailogLoginComponent); } opensignupDialog() { this.dialog.open(DailogSignupComponent); } Recommended: any = [ { id: 1, dish: 'Chicken Cheese Grilled Sandwich', price: 130 }, { id: 2, dish: 'Lassi Sweet', price: 130 }, { id: 3, dish: 'Fruit Salad with Ice Cream', price: 130 }, { id: 4, dish: 'Caramel Custard', price: 130 }, { id: 5, dish: 'Fresh Lime Soda', price: 130 }, { id: 6, dish: 'Lassi Salty', price: 130 }, { id: 7, dish: 'Lassi Sweet', price: 130 }, { id: 8, dish: 'Mountain Dew', price: 130 }, { id: 9, dish: 'Pepsi', price: 130 }, ]; add_to_cart(item: any) { this.clicked = true; setTimeout(() => { this.clicked = true; }, 1000); this.dishes.push(item); localStorage.setItem('Dishes', JSON.stringify(this.dishes)); console.log(localStorage.getItem('Dishes')); } logout() { localStorage.removeItem('pass'); localStorage.removeItem('loginId'); } }
